name: FlapBird (SamaXX)
description:
**GAME STILL IN DEV**

Flappy Bird is a simple, yet addictive mobile game in which players control a bird that must navigate through a series of pipes without hitting them. The bird is constantly falling due to gravity, and players must click spare  to make the bird fly upwards. The goal of the game is to get the bird as far as possible without crashing.
